changeOwner(address,uint256).details: should only be callable by other game contracts

changeSalesState(uint256,bool,uint256).details: should only be callable by other game contracts

changeUri(uint256,string).details: should only be callable by other game contracts

params._uri: string ipfs url for json endpoint

create(string).details: gets the price of the chains base token from chainlink

decreaseStat(uint256,uint8,uint256).details: should only be callable by other game contracts

params._amount: uin256 amount to decrease stat by

getCloneData(uint256).details: should only be callable by other game contracts

getCloneStatLevel(uint256,uint8).details: should only be callable by other game contracts

params._stat: clone stat to retrieve level of

increaseStat(uint256,uint8,uint256).details: should only be callable by other game contracts

params._amount: uin256 amount to increase stat by

changeOwner(address,uint256).notice: changes the owner of a given clone to the given address

changeSalesState(uint256,bool,uint256).notice: changes the owner of a given clone to the given address

changeUri(uint256,string).notice: changes the uri for a given clone id

decreaseStat(uint256,uint8,uint256).notice: decreases a clones stat by the given amount

getCloneData(uint256).notice: changes the uri for a given clone id

getCloneStatLevel(uint256,uint8).notice: gets the level for a specific stat on a specific clone

increaseStat(uint256,uint8,uint256).notice: increases a clones stat by the given amount

userdoc.notice: this contract serves as the central location for clone s
